Class BinarySyntheticDatasetSource¶

class mbff.dataset.sources.BinarySyntheticDatasetSource.BinarySyntheticDatasetSource(configuration)[source]¶

Bases: mbff.dataset.sources.DatasetSource.DatasetSource

A dataset source which generates a random binary dataset by specifying the proportion of values of 1 for each feature and objective.

create_dataset_matrix(label='binarydataset', other_random_seed=-1)[source]¶

The required method of a DatasetSource class. This method reads an external source of data and produces a DatasetMatrix instance based on configuration.

Parameters:label (str) – The label of the DatasetMatrix
create_random_binary_matrix(row_count, probabilities_per_column)[source]¶
create_shuffled_binary_column(row_count, p_one)[source]¶
